text: Pen Pelisi kay nɨbi tɨtay dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Sɨbɨn tap monmon okok nɨgem, tap awl tek lek, ñɨn pag nɨŋɨd dad amɨl wajɨlem ak amub agak. Amek, God nop nokom olap ñun agɨl pel ñɨbɨm agak. Ak tep gɨpɨm, takaw ma mɨdeb agak. Tap sɨkol okok pel anɨgɨl gɨpɨm ak pen, taynen takaw jɨj yɨbɨl ak abe ma gɨpɨm agak. Nɨbi God ne gos teplep nɨgup pal ak kelɨgɨpɨm agak. God nop nokom gos lɨnɨgep pal ak abe kelɨgɨpɨm agak.
